title: This cartoon wrote a sweary word on your toilet wall.
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content:
Woulda been better if he’d used some kickin’ ligatures. :þ

Peace,  
JT

Love them both, Alessandro and Mili!

ChrisL

PS: Alessandro, how are you?
I’m fine, Chris, thanks for asking.

I just don’t think that it’s right to vandal or post a graffiti on a toilet wall. It may be entertaining for some but still, it is a private property that you should know how to respect right? {link removed by moderator}
Hahahahahahaha. That may be the most desperately off-target piece of spam ever!
Those spam bots keep getting smarter, though.
You know life sucks when your job is spamming web sites for unwanted portable toilet products. Take it somewhere else, “jollivee”

That should read “You know your career is in the toilet when your job is spamming for porta-potties :-)”

ChrisL
